title: China's progress on women's causes over 70 years
text:
Take a look at some key numbers demonstrating China's progress on women's causes over the past seven decades.

The data is from a whitepaper titled "Equality, Development and Sharing: Progress of Women's Cause in 70 Years Since New China's Founding", released by the State Council Information Office in September.

As masters of the nation, women can now pursue their chosen paths to fulfill themselves while gaining an increasing sense of achievement, happiness and safety, as shown by the historic accomplishments they've made so far.
description: Take a look at some key numbers demonstrating China's progress on women's causes over the past 7 decades.
